response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, but its true worth to you surpasses $1,200,000. After careful consideration and assessment of its unique features and benefits, I propose to offer it to you for $1,000,000. This is a generous offer considering its market value and the significant impact it could have on your endeavors. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and financial capabilities. Should you require any further information or wish to discuss the details, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1000000}
